resources.string: Ensure that Device Broadcast Status is switched ON in the Spotify app on this device

Set the number of items that are shown in your listening history list and also the action that happens when swiping a list item. Choose between deleting the entry, or setting the explicit tag (left for explicit, right for not explicit). Purge the history and image cache to recover storage if needed.

Sometimes Sanctify can stop receiving notifications of track changes from Spotify. If this happens, it could be because Spotify has switched to the background. These settings try to keep Spotify alive so that the notifications continue. It is an experimental feature.
